artist: Engraver: William Byrne; Painter: After John Wootton; Delineator: Joseph Farington; Publisher: John Boydell
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in black: Wootton pinx't / I Farington delin't  John Boydell excudit 1775  W.Byrne sculpsit / HOUNDS & MAGPYE / In the small Breakfast Room at Houghton / Size of picture 4 F 1 1/2 I by 4 F 11 1/8 I height / Published Nov'r 1st 1775 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside, London  | on sheet in pencil: 2-621
title: Hounds & Magpye
